00014 namespace Util
00015 {
00016 
00017    /* 
00018    * Begin constructor
00019    */
00020    Begin::Begin(const char *label)
00021     : label_(label)
00022    {} 
00023 
00024    /* 
00025    * Read label, check against expected value
00026    */
00027    void Begin::readParam(std::istream &in)
00028    {
00029       if (isParamIoProcessor()) {
00030 
00031          // Read label
00032          std::string actual;
00033          in >> actual;
00034 
00035          // Check label   
00036          std::string expected;
00037          expected = label_ + "{";
00038          if (actual != expected) {
00039             Log::file() << "Error reading label\n";
00040             Log::file() << "Expected: " <<  expected  << std::endl;
00041             Log::file() << "Scanned:  " <<  actual    << std::endl;
00042             UTIL_THROW("Incorrect label");
00043          }
00044 
00045          if (ParamComponent::echo()) {
00046             writeParam(Log::file());
00047          }
00048 
00049       }
00050    }
00051 
00052    /* 
00053    * Begin::writeParam() template
00054    */
00055    void Begin::writeParam(std::ostream &out)
00056    {
00057       out << indent() << label_ << "{" << std::endl;
00058    }
00059 
00060    /*
00061    * Do-nothing implementation of virtual resetIo function.
00062    */
00063    void Begin::resetParam()
00064    {}
00065 
00066 } 
00067 #endif
